title: beta client masteries and the legacy client keep crashing
body: sometimes when i go to try and change my masteries in champ select it wont let me use all of my points and changes all my other masteries pages to the same thing so i have to dodge. also when i try to launch the legacy client it will crash

replies.body:
There are two separate issues here, so let's address them in order.
___
1. First, the mastery pages issue usually crops up when one or more of your mastery pages is corrupt. You can resolve this by deleting **all** of your mastery pages and recreating them from scratch.
____

2. How are you launching the Legacy Client? Are you launching it from the installation folder or from the login screen for the Beta?
I'm launching it from the login screen
Great, that's where it should be launched from. What happens when it crashes? Do you see a specific error message? Also, did the mastery fix I gave you work?

the league of legends logo pops up and then nothing happens. the masteries still mess up at times i deleted all my pages a few times, and with the new season starting im scared to start playing ranked again

Be sure you're launching the game as admin (right-click, select *run as admin*), as not doing so can cause League to not launch. If this worked, please let me know. Also, let me know if you experience the mastery issues with the Legacy Client.

Not sure if it's connected, but does it sound similar to anything they are investigating for the Beta in this thread?
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/0jmthbxZ-help-us-track-down-some-elusive-bugs
